mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE BN_USER ( NO INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT , REG_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , ENABLED BOOLEAN DEFAULT 'N' , ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL , NICK_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL , ICON VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL , ROLE VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL , NOTE VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL , AUTH_HINT VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL , DAILY_UPLOAD_LIMIT BIGINT DEFAULT 0 , DAILY_DOWNLOAD_LIMIT BIGINT DEFAULT 0 , MAX_STORAGE_USAGE BIGINT DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE TABLE BN_USER_PW ( USER_NO INT PRIMARY KEY , UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , AUTH_VALUE VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL , FOREIGN KEY(USER_NO) REFERENCES BN_USER(NO) ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE BN_USER_LOGIN_RECORD ( NO INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT , REG_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , IP VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL , USER_AGENT VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL , STATUS VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL , REQ_ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL , USER_NO INT DEFAULT -1 , FOREIGN KEY(USER_NO) REFERENCES BN_USER(NO) )
mapper.sql: NO AS "userNo" , REG_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , ENABLED , ID , NICK_NAME , ICON AS "profileImg" , NOTE , ROLE , DAILY_UPLOAD_LIMIT , DAILY_DOWNLOAD_LIMIT , MAX_STORAGE_USAGE
